name: Tiny God
description:
Tiny God is an action-adventure 3rd person game where the protagonist is saved by a little god who then grants him magic. Together they must fight against the suppression through technology used by their enemies. Help the little adventurer complete his epic quest of saving his people from the seemingly evil technology and bring back the magic to the land!

Tiny God is being developed by a small team of 4 people as part of their master classes at the University of Applied Science in Augsburg. Supervisors for this project are Jens Müller and Sebastian de Andrade.

Note, the menu can be controlled via the mouse and the game can only be played with an XBox Controller!

Team:

Project Lead: Jenny Neuhard
Design: Alena Keln & Alexander Baur
Programming: Jenny Neuhard & Tonio Kaminsky
Sound: Alexander Baur, Tonio Kaminsky & Sonniss GDC 2017
